title: undefined method + for nil with svg
body:
```ruby
visit "https://jsfiddle.net/gh/get/jquery/1.7.2/highslide-software/highcharts.com/tree/master/samples/highcharts/boost/line/"

within_frame "result" do
  svg = find "div svg"
  p svg
end

within_frame "result" do
  elems = all "div svg *"
  puts "got #{elems.size} elements"

  elems.each_with_index do |el, index|
    puts "index: #{index}"
    puts "-"*80
    puts el.inspect
  end
end
```

output:
```
#<Capybara::Node::Element tag="svg" path="/html/body/div/div/./*[((local-name(.) = 'svg') and (namespace-uri(.) = 'http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'))]">
got 82 elements
index: 0

index: 1
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

	 8: from /Users/mpa/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.5.1@kapybara/bundler/gems/capybara-51bed769a2b2/lib/capybara/session.rb:418:in `within_frame'

/Users/mpa/.rvm/gems/ruby-2.5.1@kapybara/bundler/gems/capybara-51bed769a2b2/lib/capybara/selenium/node.rb:171:in `path': undefined method `+' for nil:NilClass (NoMethodError)
```

repro in https://github.com/matti/kapybara - `ruby kapybara.rb tests/svg_jsfiddle.rb`
Sorry didn't have time to setup capybara specs (nokogiri incompatible library version...)

That is using capybara from master https://github.com/matti/kapybara/blob/master/Gemfile#L3

another repro with `ruby kapybara.rb tests/svg_local.rb` (uses the #2050 svg document)

```ruby
visit "http://localhost:4567/svg.html"

elems = all "svg *"

elems.each_with_index do |el, i|
  puts i
  puts el.inspect
end
```
